SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.material

Class WordMaterial

java.lang.Object
net.elena.murat.material.WordMaterial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Material
public class WordMaterial extends Object implements Material
Material class that generates textures with rendered text and optional image on the fly. Supports custom text, fonts, colors, gradients, transparent backgrounds, and image integration. Uses planar UV mapping on XY plane (Z ignored) similar to TransparentPNGMaterial.

  • Constructor Details

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text)
      Constructor with default styling (white text on transparent background, Arial Bold 48)
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render on the material

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font)
      Constructor with custom colors and font
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Text color (RGB or ARGB)
      backgroundColor - Background color (use 0x00000000 for transparent)
      font - The font to use for rendering

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font, Color gradientColor)
      Constructor with gradient support
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Starting gradient color
      backgroundColor - Background color
      font - The font to use
      gradientColor - Ending gradient color (if null, no gradient is applied)

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font, BufferedImage wordImage)
      Constructor with image support
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Text color
      backgroundColor - Background color
      font - The font to use
      wordImage - Optional image to display above text (null for text only)

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font, int width, int height)
      Constructor with custom size
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Text color
      backgroundColor - Background color
      font - The font to use
      width - Texture width
      height - Texture height

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String sentence, Color textColor, Font sentenceFont, int maxWidth, double uOffset, double vOffset)
      Constructor for sentences with automatic sizing and UV offset support
      Parameters:
      sentence - The sentence text to render
      textColor - Text color
      sentenceFont - Font for the sentence
      maxWidth - Maximum texture width
      uOffset - Horizontal UV offset
      vOffset - Vertical UV offset

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String[] lines, Color textColor, Font sentenceFont, int maxWidth, double uOffset, double vOffset)
      Constructor for multi-line sentences with automatic sizing and UV offset support
      Parameters:
      lines - Array of text lines
      textColor - Text color
      sentenceFont - Font for the sentences
      maxWidth - Maximum texture width
      uOffset - Horizontal UV offset
      vOffset - Vertical UV offset

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font, boolean useGradient, Color gradientColor, BufferedImage wordImage, int width, int height, double uOffset, double vOffset)
      Full constructor with all parameters including UV offset support
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Text color
      backgroundColor - Background color
      font - The font to use
      useGradient - Whether to apply gradient effect
      gradientColor - Gradient end color (required if useGradient is true)
      wordImage - Optional image to display above text (null for text only)
      width - Texture width
      height - Texture height
      uOffset - Horizontal UV offset
      vOffset - Vertical UV offset

    • WordMaterial

      public WordMaterial(String text, Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor, Font font, boolean useGradient, Color gradientColor, BufferedImage wordImage, int width, int height)
      Full constructor with all parameters (without UV offset)
      Parameters:
      text - The text to render
      foregroundColor - Text color
      backgroundColor - Background color
      font - The font to use
      useGradient - Whether to apply gradient effect
      gradientColor - Gradient end color (required if useGradient is true)
      wordImage - Optional image to display above text (null for text only)
      width - Texture width
      height - Texture height
